meanings.definition: Having a thick, muscular neck resembling that of a bull.
meanings.sent1: The bullnecked wrestler easily lifted his opponent off the ground.
meanings.sent2: The bullnecked bouncer stood at the entrance, intimidating anyone who tried to enter.
meanings.sent3: Despite his bullnecked appearance, he was actually quite gentle and kind.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as bullnecked as her physical strength.
meanings.sent5: The bullnecked oak tree stood tall and sturdy in the forest.
